short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helping Boycott Products with ethical concerns related to apartheid, human rights violations, war crime and other injustices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Ethical Shopper" extension is intended to promote ethical consumer choices by providing information about product origins. It does not take sides in any political or social issue. Users are encouraged to research and make their own informed decisions when purchasing products.

NOTE: For functionality, make sure to PIN the extension after install!
